arts.ttl: The Lowdown on Bromley 1 Morecambe 0 - Cheek penalty makes the difference as Bromley pile the misery on Morecambe
arts.sum: Bromley cruised to a 1-0 win over bottom of League two Morecambe thanks to a Michael Cheek penalty at Hayes Lane, in a match that also saw Morecambe’s David Tutonda dismissed in a farcical fit of dissent. The Morecambe man had a difficult job to do as he came off the bench in the first half to replace the injured Jamie Stott, but it was a poor start to the day for him as he gave away a penalty for a naive challenge on Imray to hand Bromley the lead.

arts.ttl: ‘I want to be taken seriously as a manager’ - Andy Woodman demanding more from Bromley
arts.sum: “What is important for me is I want to be taken seriously as a manager,” said Woodman. “It has been a step in standard, for sure,” said Woodman.

arts.ttl: Michael Cheek earns win for Bromley as Morecambe slip closer to relegation
Preview: Bromley vs. Morecambe - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's League Two clash between Bromley and Morecambe, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Bromley's 5-0 hammering by Port Vale at the weekend was their fourth defeat in their last seven games and they will be now concentrating on building for next season after their play off hopes were dim...
